songs.title: Under the Radar
songs.firstLine: Nobody saw our sails on the horizon
songs.lastLine: Here we come, fife and drum, under the radar we crept on!

songs.title: Building Steam
songs.firstLine: I, I've suffered long enough in this ghost town
songs.lastLine: repeat last three lines 5x

songs.title: Until The Day You Die
songs.firstLine: I've chased this dream since I was five
songs.lastLine: Until the day I die

songs.title: My Life
songs.firstLine: My love
songs.lastLine: And abuse

songs.title: Wanderlust
songs.firstLine: This world is filled with islands
songs.lastLine: Alive!

songs.title: Throw Them Overboard
songs.firstLine: If you map out my psychology
songs.lastLine: And you can line them up and throw them overboard!

songs.title: The Derelict
songs.firstLine: Fifteen men on the Dead Man's chest
songs.lastLine: Yo-Ho-Ho and a bottle of rum!

songs.title: Victoria
songs.firstLine: Victoria, come back to me
songs.lastLine: Why did I let you leave?

songs.title: Ather Shanty
songs.firstLine: My arms aching, back's breaking, legs aching, neck
songs.lastLine: No telling just now what we have in store.

songs.title: The Clock Yard
songs.firstLine: There was a young boy in a clock yard
songs.lastLine: I must leave."

songs.title: Too Far To Turn Back
songs.firstLine: We've come too far to turn back
songs.lastLine: Turn back turn back turn back turn back...

songs.title: Simulacrum
songs.firstLine: These throws of rapture, kindly hands caress broken bones, hands that cut through parched soul like a sharpened stone. What is it that we leave in these fitting moments? Sentiment? These curtains fall and wrap us up in our rigor mortis, the nimble fingers of the black one, his majesty of cold, courting me into sweet abeyance. The malign steely touch of needle thorns massing and directing their gaze on my misfiring neurons. The vestiges of my sickening life, of my loves, my crowning glories, the pain and poetry of a spent existence. He coils up inside me now, kissing me and whispering sweet nothings. The words of release, the words I crave as I lose all, as the clotted mass of cumuli nimbus bows his head in salute. As i claw upwards, as i fall back into oblivion and his words speak out amongst the frightening turbulence, those final fleeting words i coax from his abhorrent throat. "Will you join my owsla?"
songs.lastLine: These throws of rapture, kindly hands caress broken bones, hands that cut through parched soul like a sharpened stone. What is it that we leave in these fitting moments? Sentiment? These curtains fall and wrap us up in our rigor mortis, the nimble fingers of the black one, his majesty of cold, courting me into sweet abeyance. The malign steely touch of needle thorns massing and directing their gaze on my misfiring neurons. The vestiges of my sickening life, of my loves, my crowning glories, the pain and poetry of a spent existence. He coils up inside me now, kissing me and whispering sweet nothings. The words of release, the words I crave as I lose all, as the clotted mass of cumuli nimbus bows his head in salute. As i claw upwards, as i fall back into oblivion and his words speak out amongst the frightening turbulence, those final fleeting words i coax from his abhorrent throat. "Will you join my owsla?"

songs.title: Fu Inle
songs.firstLine: My brother be,
songs.lastLine: ring the change of days now done.

songs.title: Republic Of Heaven
songs.firstLine: We wane in remembrance,
songs.lastLine: To this reform!

songs.title: The Burial
songs.firstLine: Like fingers they claw at the sky,
songs.lastLine: we ignore their remorse.

songs.title: Woundwort
songs.firstLine: At the crux of our nation,
songs.lastLine: We suffered far too long.

songs.title: Warren Of Snares
songs.firstLine: We can account for the scars in our sides,
songs.lastLine: I am legion for we are many.

songs.title: Airportman
songs.firstLine: He moves efficiently
songs.lastLine: Discounted.

songs.title: Lotus
songs.firstLine: Hey hey.
songs.lastLine: I ate the lotus

songs.title: Suspicion
songs.firstLine: Now my suspicion's on the rise
songs.lastLine: Dream, Dream

songs.title: Hope
songs.firstLine: You want to go out Friday
songs.lastLine: You want to go forever.

songs.title: At My Most Beautiful
songs.firstLine: I've found a way to make you smile
songs.lastLine: A way to make you smile

songs.title: The Apologist
songs.firstLine: They call me the apologist.
songs.lastLine: I'm so sorry.

songs.title: Sad Professor
songs.firstLine: If we're talking about love
songs.lastLine: I hate where I wound up.

songs.title: You're In The Air
songs.firstLine: You wanted a challenge
songs.lastLine: And I am breathing you

songs.title: Walk Unafraid
songs.firstLine: As the sun comes up, as the moon goes down
songs.lastLine: Hold my love or leave me high.

songs.title: Daysleeper
songs.firstLine: Receiving department, 3 a.m.
songs.lastLine: Daysleeper. Daysleeper. Daysleeper.

songs.title: Diminished
songs.firstLine: I watched you fall.
songs.lastLine: Does she know I sing?

songs.title: I'm Not Over You
songs.firstLine: I feel great. I lied to save your feelings.
songs.lastLine: I'm not over you.

songs.title: Parakeet
songs.firstLine: You wake up in the morning
songs.lastLine: Baby starts to breathe.

songs.title: Black Zone
songs.firstLine: They ripped up all the grass and they cut down all the trees, built a fence - little sign says 'Keep away, if you please...' And it was difficult to argue with the trenches and the guns. 50,000 volts, the wires buzzing - touch it and you're D.O.A. (d.c.) Deceased! Your secret's safe with us. The trucks roll in at midnight - skull and crossbones on the headlights. They carry poison, carry fission for the Black Zone... Hear the test-tubes bubble with disease for enemies (I hope there's not a breeze!) And the villigers line up outside with placards, sing 'Abide with me'. The guards just laugh - smoke rises in the distance... Because the Black Zone's here to stay and it's here to protect us, 'til that black and bitter day when test-tube spills and blows us all away.
songs.lastLine: They ripped up all the grass and they cut down all the trees, built a fence - little sign says 'Keep away, if you please...' And it was difficult to argue with the trenches and the guns. 50,000 volts, the wires buzzing - touch it and you're D.O.A. (d.c.) Deceased! Your secret's safe with us. The trucks roll in at midnight - skull and crossbones on the headlights. They carry poison, carry fission for the Black Zone... Hear the test-tubes bubble with disease for enemies (I hope there's not a breeze!) And the villigers line up outside with placards, sing 'Abide with me'. The guards just laugh - smoke rises in the distance... Because the Black Zone's here to stay and it's here to protect us, 'til that black and bitter day when test-tube spills and blows us all away.

songs.title: Tower One
songs.firstLine: Faces at a window, fingers clutching at the bars.
songs.lastLine: Winston, Patrick, April, Philip, Roland, Barry, Sally, Patrick, Me! Me! Mimi...

songs.title: If I were the wind
songs.firstLine: If I were the wind and you were the rain
songs.lastLine: My son my son.

songs.title: Faithless
songs.firstLine: An old man came here telling tales
songs.lastLine: Are those still standing tall beyond the china wall.

songs.title: All Over Now
songs.firstLine: From the first drop of blood spilt
songs.lastLine: I'll find some comfort here.

songs.title: Give It To Me
songs.firstLine: One man fills his pockets with gold
songs.lastLine: You cannot put back the fruit on the tree.

songs.title: Green Eyed Angel
songs.firstLine: All those friends I've known and lost they tell me it'll be alright.
songs.lastLine: Hearts so young against a heart of stone.

songs.title: A Man Of Nomadic Traits
songs.firstLine: I am a man of nomadic traits.
songs.lastLine: Look with kind and gentle eyes.

songs.title: And Finally...
songs.firstLine: Heading for hope - heading for home
songs.lastLine: They're flesh and blood they were human beings

songs.title: King Of The Castle
songs.firstLine: Crossing the wastelands to carry me home.
songs.lastLine: Free spirit I've travelled so follow me now.
